strapiPost.title: Hawaiian Bros Island Grill Coming To Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Kansas City-based fast food company, Hawaiian Bros Island Grill plans to open its first Arkansas location in Springdale. 

  • Order up: Paying homage to the Hawaiian plate lunch, Hawaiian Bros menu includes white rice, macaroni salad, and a choice of proteins like grilled chicken and slow-roasted pork. 
  • Sweet tooth: Hawaiian Bros also serves dole, a frozen, dairy-free soft-serve dessert, that is sure to satisfy a sweet tooth. 

Check out other restaurants coming to Northwest Arkansas HERE.
